section.title: sales orders rescheduling of line items Reschedule all S/O Line Items
section.para: To reschedule all Line Items associated with a Sales Order, select the "Reschedule all S/O Line Items" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Reschedule All Sales Order Line Items

section.para: When rescheduling all Line Items associated with a Sales Order, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Sales Order Number of the Sales Order whose Line Items you want to reschedule.

note.para: This utility reschedules all Line Items associated with a Sales Order. You would edit a Sales Order to selectively reschedule individual Line Items.

listitem.para: Specify the new schedule date for the Line Items.
Displays the name of the Customer associated with the Sales Order.
Displays the Customer's Purchase Order Number.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Creates the new schedule date for all Line Items associated with the specified Sales Order.
